card.name: Lost Soul
card.text: ■ Your opponent discards all cards from his hand.

card.name: Romanesk, the Dragon Wizard
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your mana zone. ■ End Step

card.name: Sanctuary of the Mother
card.text: ■ Put one of your non-evolution creatures in the battle zone into your mana zone. If you do, choose an evolution creature in your mana zone that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone.

card.name: Kiryu Jilves, Gaia's Roar
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your creatures gets "slayer" and "speed attacker" until the End Step

card.name: Faerie Miracle
card.text: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ If you have all civilizations in your mana zone, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.

card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, untap all cards in your mana zone.

card.name: Glennya, Boiling Water

card.name: Prometheus, Splash Axe
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped. Then return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Kernel, Blue Stagnation Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent’s creatures. Until the start of your next turn, that creature can't attack or block.
